creditline: Gift of the John C. Weber Collection
description: small blue glazed plate with white rabbit at center; chain link white on blue pattern around lip; low round foot; underside is white with three spiral and squiggle designs in blue; natural wood box with lid and blue stripe tie
inscription: On box, top: 初期伊万里網兎文皿 {Shoki Imari mōto mon zara); front side: 網目白抜兎文 {Amime shironuki usagi mon}; back side: 周辺網目見込白抜兎文 {Shūhen amime mikomi shironuki usagi mon}
medium: Imari ware; porcelain with cobalt blue underglaze
title: Small dish with design of rabbit
